# SLA Template for AI System Resilience

## Objective
Ensure 99.9% uptime in contested environments, with incident response per NIST AI RMF MANAGE 4.3.

## Key Metrics
- **Mean Time to Detect (MTTD)**: < 5 minutes for connectivity loss.
- **Mean Time to Recover (MTTR)**: < 15 minutes, via sovereign fallback.
- **Availability**: 99.9% monthly.

## Incident Categories
- Level 1 (Critical): Edge failure – Respond in 1 min, recover in 5 min.
- Level 2 (Medium): Performance degradation – Respond in 10 min.



Signed: January 22, 2026
